title: JSON schema definition for authentication context data in Dutch government landscapes

_naturalPerson:base.title: Base Natural Person
_naturalPerson:base.description: reusable JSON schema to describe a reference to a natural person.

identifierType.title: Identifier type
identifierType.description: A natural person is always identified by their BSN (social security number).

identifier.title: Identifier value
identifier.description: BSN which uniquely identifies the authenticated person. Note that the value must follow the format rules for Dutch social security numbers.

naturalPerson.title: Natural Person
naturalPerson.description: JSON schema to describe a reference to a natural person.

_company:kvk.title: Identifying attributes for a company by KVK number

identifierType.title: Identifier type
identifierType.description: A company can be identified by its chamber of commerce number.

identifier.title: Identifier value
identifier.description: Chamber of commerce number (KVK-nummer) that uniquely identifies the company.

_company:rsin.title: Identifying attributes for a company by RSIN

identifierType.title: Identifier type
identifierType.description: A company can be identified by its RSIN.

identifier.title: Identifier value
identifier.description: RSIN that uniquely identifies the legal entity.

company:actingSubject.title: Person acting for an authenticated company
company:actingSubject.description: The actual person who authenticated to represent the given company in their actions.

identifierType.description: The identifier is always some encrypted form, specific to the service provider. I.e. the same physical person gets different identifier values when authenting with different service providers.

company:withoutBranchRestriction.title: A company without branch restriction
company:withoutBranchRestriction.description: A 'company', registered in the Chamber of Commerce (KVK). Can be identified by the COC-number or RSIN. No branch restriction implies this refers to the whole company and all its branches.

company:withBranchRestriction.title: A company with branch restriction
company:withBranchRestriction.description: A 'company', registered in the Chamber of Commerce (KVK). Can be identified by the COC-number or RSIN. A branch restriction only allows 'access' to one of the main company branches. Branch restrictions can only be applied in certain contexts.

branchNumber.title: Branch number
branchNumber.description: The branch number imposes a restriction on the acting subject - it is limited to act only on this particular branch of the legal subject.

source.title: Means used for authentication
source.description: Fixed value to indicate DigiD authentication.

loa.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa.description: Logius defines the available levels of assurance *and* prescribes what the minimum level must be.

service.title: A service reference
service.description: DigiD mandates are bound to either a single service or serviceSet (a collection of services). A service is identified by its ID.

serviceSet.title: A set of services (aka theme)
serviceSet.description: A group of related services for which a mandate can be extended. TODO!

withoutMandate.title: Authentication context data schema for DigiD without mandate

authorizee.title: Authorizee (ge-autoriseerde)
authorizee.description: The person who is authorized. Because no mandate is involved, the representee and the authorizee are the same person.

legalSubject.title: Legal subject
legalSubject.description: The legal beneficiary of the service(s). Because no mandata is involved, the acting subject and legal subject are the same person.

withMandate.title: Authentication context data schema for DigiD with mandate.
withMandate.description: DigiD Machtigen (or also known as CombiConnect) is a form of voluntary mandate. A natural person represents another natural person.

authorizee.title: Authorizee (gemachtigde)
authorizee.description: The person who is authorized. Because no mandate is involved, the representee and the authorizee are the same person.

legalSubject.title: Legal subject
legalSubject.description: The legal, natural person, mandated to act on behalf of the representee.

mandate.title: Mandate context
mandate.description: Additional context describing the extent of the mandate. At least one dimension/property must be provided.

source.title: Means used for authentication
source.description: Fixed value to indicate eHerkenning authentication.

loa.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa.description: afsprakenstelsel.etoegang.nl defines the available levels of assurance *and* prescribes what the minimum level must be. Note that a minimum of loa2plus is required these days.

role.title: Role of the mandate, which determines the level of access to services
role.description: The role of a mandate, typically assigned through judicial procedures.

service.title: A service reference
service.description: Identifying properties of a service present in the service catalog.

id.description: The ServiceID from the service catalog, for example: 'urn:etoegang:DV:00000001002308836000:services:9113'.

uuid.description: The ServiceUUID from the service catalog.

mandate.title: Mandate context
mandate.description: Additional context describing the extent of the mandate. At least one dimension/property must be provided.

mandate:common.title: Common properties for eHerkenning auth with mandate

mandate:naturalPerson.title: Authentication context data schema for eHerkenning representing a natural person

authorizee.title: Authorizee (ge-autoriseerde)
authorizee.description: The company that is authorized to act on behalf of the representee.

mandate:company.title: Authentication context data schema for eHerkenning representing a company (ketenmachtiging). There cannot be a branch restriction here.

authorizee.title: Authorizee (ge-autoriseerde)
authorizee.description: The company that is authorized to act on behalf of the representee.

withoutMandate.title: Authentication context data schema for eHerkenning without mandate

authorizee.title: Authorizee (ge-autoriseerde)
authorizee.description: The company that is authorized. Because no mandate is involved, the representee and the authorizee are the same company.

withMandate.title: Authentication context data schema for eHerkenning with mandate

source.title: Means used for authentication
source.description: Fixed value to indicate eIDAS authentication.

loa.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa.description: https://ec.europa.eu/digital-building-blocks/sites/display/DIGITAL/eIDAS+Levels+of+Assurance defines the available levels of assurance.

service.title: A service reference
service.description: eIDAS mandates are bound to a single service. A service is identified by its ID.

mandate.title: Mandate context
mandate.description: Additional context describing the extent of the mandate. At least one dimension/property must be provided.

naturalPerson.title: Properties for an eIDAS natural person

identifierType.description: A natural person can be identified by BSN or opaque.

identifier.description: The identifier could be a bsn, pseudonym or any other european person identification, so we cannot apply some sort detailed specification or validation.

firstName.description: The legal firstname of the natural person

familyName.description: The legal family name/lastname of the natural person

dateOfBirth.description: The legal date of birth of the natural person

identifierType.description: A company will be identified by a opaque string containing; country code, schema type and a unique identification number.

identifier.description: A pseudonym value, structured as `<CountryCode>/<Scheme>/<IDValue>`, identifying the company.

companyName.description: The legal name of the company

withNaturalPerson.title: Authentication context data schema for eIDAS representing a natural person without company information.
withNaturalPerson.$comment: This schema contains experimental features. Subject to change.

withCompany.title: Authentication context data schema for eIDAS representing a natural person with company information.
withCompany.$comment: This schema contains experimental features. Subject to change.

source.description: Fixed value to indicate Yivi authentication.

loa:unknown.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa:unknown.description: If loa for some reason isn't available (for example, pseudo login) we fallback to the value 'unknown'.

loa:bsn.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa:bsn.description: Logius defines the available levels of assurance *and* prescribes what the minimum level must be.

loa:kvk.title: Level of assurance (betrouwbaarheidsniveaus)
loa:kvk.description: afsprakenstelsel.etoegang.nl defines the available levels of assurance *and* prescribes what the minimum level must be. Note that a minimum of loa2plus is required these days.

additionalInformation.title: A collection of additional attributes, collected during authentication
additionalInformation.description: Yivi supports the fetching of additional personal or company attributes, that help identify the authorizee.

withNaturalPerson.$comment: This schema contains experimental features. Subject to change.

withCompany.$comment: This schema contains experimental features. Subject to change.

withPseudo.$comment: This schema contains experimental features. Subject to change.
